 The Board of Directors is a group of people who oversee the company's management and make important decisions about the company's future. The CEO is the top executive of the company and is responsible for implementing the company's strategy and managing the day-to-day operations. The stockholders are the owners of the company and have a say in how the company is run through their ownership of stock.

 Sure , I can help you with that. Here are some steps you can follow: 1.   Create a resume that highlights your skills and experience. 2.   Use job search websites like Indeed or LinkedIn to find job openings. 3.   Apply to jobs that match your skills and experience. 4.   Follow up with the hiring manager to see if you have been selected for an interview. 5.   Prepare for the interview by researching the company and practicing common interview questions. 6.   Attend the interview and make a good impression. 7.   Follow up with the hiring manager after the interview to see if you have been selected for the job. 8.   If you are not selected, don't give up. Keep applying to jobs and improving your skills.

 Sure , the Dragon-Boat Festival is a traditional Chinese festival that is celebrated on the fifth day of the fifth lunar month. It is also known as the Duanwu Festival. The festival is named after the legend of Qu Yuan, a patriotic poet who drowned himself in the river to protest against the corrupt government. The festival is celebrated by dragon-boat racing and eating rice dumplings. 
 I'm good , thanks .
